rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"$G.ess=true and nullsub(one.click in $L.file,false)=false)"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"//if is src, add to smis task\u000aif (system.vars.$lo_idol_img_enabled || system.vars.$lo_idol_enabled) {\u000a /** copy mandant value from operator to current $L.file -- test purpose */\u000a lib.IDOL_Help.checkValue(record)\u000a record.doSave();\u000a /** copy mandant value from operator to current $L.file */\u000a \u000a if (vars.$G_src) {\u000a\u0009/**\u000a * to support Smart Ticket mandant and mandant value perhaps be array (not only a string)\u000a **/ \u000a var pCompany = [];\u000a pCompany = lib.SmartTicketMandantTools.getCurrentUserMandantValue();\u000a lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(record, 'OCR', pCompany); \u000a /**\u000a\u0009if (vars['$G.multi']) {\u000a \u0009company = vars['$lo.operator']['company'];\u000a \u0009lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(vars['$L.file'], 'OCR', company);\u000a } else {\u000a \u0009lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(vars['$L.file'], 'OCR');\u000a }\u000a */\u000a } else {\u000a\u0009var attachments = record.getAttachments();\u000a\u0009var attLen = 0;\u000a\u0009for (var i = 0; i < attachments.length; i++) {\u000a\u0009\u0009if (lib.IDOL_Utilities.isImage(attachments[i])){\u000a\u0009\u0009\u0009attLen++;\u000a\u0009\u0009\u0009break;\u000a\u0009\u0009}\u000a\u0009}\u000a\u0009//call OCR interface\u000a\u0009if (vars.$G_ess && (system.vars.$lo_idol_img_enabled || system.vars.$lo_idol_enabled) && attLen > 0)\u000a\u0009{\u000a var pCompany = [];\u000a pCompany = lib.SmartTicketMandantTools.getCurrentUserMandantValue();\u000a lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(record, 'OCR', pCompany);\u000a \u000a /**\u000a \u0009if (vars['$G.multi']) {\u000a \u0009\u0009company = vars['$lo.operator']['company'];\u000a \u0009\u0009lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(record, 'OCR', company);\u000a \u0009} else {\u000a \u0009\u0009lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(record, 'OCR');\u000a \u0009}\u000a */\u000a \u000a\u0009} else if ((vars.$G_ess && (system.vars.$lo_idol_img_enabled || system.vars.$lo_idol_enabled) && attLen === 0)) {\u000a\u0009 /**\u000a * to support Smart Ticket mandant and mandant value perhaps be array (not only a string)\u000a **/ \u000a\u0009 var pCompany = [];\u000a pCompany = lib.SmartTicketMandantTools.getCurrentUserMandantValue();\u000a //print(\"in RuleSet to add autofill task\");\u000a lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(record, 'AutoFill', pCompany);\u000a \u000a\u0009 /**\u000a\u0009\u0009 if (vars['$G.multi']) {\u000a \u0009\u0009company = vars['$lo.operator']['company'];\u000a \u0009\u0009lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(record, 'AutoFill', company);\u000a \u0009 } else {\u000a \u0009\u0009lib.IDOL_SMIS.addOCRTask(record, 'AutoFill');\u000a \u0009 }\u000a */\u000a\u0009 }\u000a }\u000a}"}
